resources.title: Common Voice Scripted Speech 24.0 - Pashto
resources.summary: Large open Pashto speech dataset for ASR training and evaluation.
resources.evidence_text: Official dataset page is for Pashto.

resources.title: Google FLEURS
resources.summary: Standard multilingual speech benchmark dataset with Pashto subset.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset config includes ps_af.

resources.title: OSCAR Corpus
resources.summary: Large web text corpus that includes Pashto text split.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset includes unshuffled_deduplicated_ps split.

resources.title: Wikimedia Wikipedia
resources.summary: Wikipedia corpus with Pashto edition for cleaner text resources.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset includes 20231101.ps subset.

resources.title: Belebele
resources.summary: Reading comprehension dataset with Pashto script subset.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset includes pbt_Arab subset.

resources.title: OPUS-100
resources.summary: Parallel corpus with English to Pashto split for MT tasks.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset viewer includes en-ps split.

resources.title: Pashto Isolated Words Speech Dataset
resources.summary: Speech dataset focused on isolated Pashto words.
resources.primary_use: Keyword spotting and constrained ASR experiments
resources.evidence_text: Dataset title explicitly states Pashto speech dataset.

resources.title: Pashto Word Embeddings
resources.summary: Pretrained Pashto word vectors for classic NLP baselines.
resources.primary_use: Lexical semantics and lightweight NLP baselines
resources.evidence_text: Dataset description states pretrained Pashto embeddings.

resources.title: Whisper Large v3
resources.summary: Strong multilingual ASR baseline suitable for Pashto bootstrapping.
resources.evidence_text: Whisper tokenizer map includes ps language key.

resources.title: MMS 1B All
resources.summary: Multilingual ASR model from MMS for low-resource transfer.
resources.evidence_text: MMS coverage table includes pus with ASR support.

resources.title: MMS TTS
resources.summary: Multilingual TTS checkpoints useful for Pashto voice synthesis.
resources.evidence_text: MMS coverage table includes pus with TTS support.

resources.title: NLLB-200 Distilled 600M
resources.summary: General multilingual translation model with Pashto script token support.
resources.evidence_text: Model special token map includes pbt_Arab.

resources.title: OPUS MT en-mul
resources.summary: Translation model that can route English into Pashto via multilingual set.
resources.evidence_text: Language list includes pus code.

resources.title: OPUS MT mul-en
resources.summary: Translation model for Pashto to English via multilingual encoder.
resources.evidence_text: Language list includes pus code.

resources.title: PashtoBERT
resources.summary: Pashto-specific encoder model for NLP transfer tasks.
resources.evidence_text: Model card states training on Pashto corpus data.

resources.title: FLEURS Pashto Benchmark
resources.summary: Fixed multilingual speech benchmark with Pashto subset for WER and CER.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset includes ps_af split.

resources.title: Common Voice Pashto v24 Benchmark
resources.summary: Core benchmark reference for project-level Pashto ASR tracking.
resources.evidence_text: Official Pashto split and versioned release.

resources.title: Belebele Pashto Benchmark
resources.summary: Comprehension benchmark for multilingual NLP with Pashto variant.
resources.evidence_text: Includes pbt_Arab language variant.

resources.title: FLORES-200 Pashto Benchmark
resources.summary: Translation benchmark language inventory including Pashto script variant.
resources.primary_use: MT benchmark with BLEU and chrF
resources.evidence_text: Language list includes pbt_Arab.

resources.title: Faster-Whisper
resources.summary: Optimized Whisper inference runtime for faster Pashto ASR experiments.
resources.evidence_text: Whisper tokenizer includes ps and tool runs Whisper models.

resources.title: Coqui TTS
resources.summary: Open toolkit for TTS training and inference used for Pashto experiments.
resources.evidence_text: Can be paired with Pashto-supporting MMS checkpoints.

resources.title: Robust Speech Recognition via Large-Scale Weak Supervision
resources.summary: Whisper paper used as a foundational ASR reference for Pashto baselines.
resources.evidence_text: Paired with tokenizer language map containing ps.

resources.title: Scaling Speech Technology to 1,000+ Languages
resources.summary: MMS paper covering multilingual speech scaling and low-resource transfer.
resources.evidence_text: Coverage table marks pus support in MMS release.

resources.title: No Language Left Behind
resources.summary: NLLB paper supporting multilingual MT strategy for Pashto integration.
resources.evidence_text: Model usage in repo references pbt_Arab token support.

resources.title: FLEURS: Few-shot Learning Evaluation of Universal Representations of Speech
resources.summary: FLEURS benchmark paper supporting multilingual speech evaluation including Pashto.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset implementation includes ps_af language code.

resources.title: 99 Hours Pashto Spontaneous Dialogue Smartphone Speech Dataset
resources.summary: Large spontaneous Pashto smartphone speech dataset for robust ASR experimentation.
resources.primary_use: Spontaneous speech ASR training and robustness evaluation
resources.evidence_text: Dataset title explicitly includes Pashto and API metadata marks audio and text modalities.

resources.title: Zirak-AI PashtoOCR
resources.summary: Pashto-focused OCR dataset with image-text pairs for document understanding tasks.
resources.evidence_text: Dataset tags include language:ps and the dataset name is PashtoOCR.

resources.title: Pashto Wikipedia Corpus
resources.summary: Pashto text corpus prepared from Wikipedia data for NLP and language modeling.
resources.primary_use: Pashto text corpus for NLP baselines
resources.evidence_text: Dataset metadata includes language:ps and the title specifies Pashto corpus.

resources.title: wav2vec2 XLS-R 300M Pashto
resources.summary: Fine-tuned wav2vec2 XLS-R model for Pashto ASR with published FLEURS evaluation tags.
resources.primary_use: Pashto ASR baseline and comparative experiments
resources.evidence_text: Model tags include pashto and ps, and model index references FLEURS config ps_af.

resources.title: Whisper Medium Pashto
resources.summary: Fine-tuned Whisper Medium checkpoint for Pashto ASR with benchmark metadata.
resources.primary_use: Pashto ASR baseline and transcription quality comparisons
resources.evidence_text: Model tags include pashto and ps, and model index uses FLEURS ps_af split.

resources.title: POLD - Pashto Offensive Language Dataset
resources.summary: Benchmark dataset for offensive content detection in Pashto social text.
resources.primary_use: Pashto toxicity and moderation NLP benchmarks
resources.evidence_text: Kaggle title and description explicitly state Pashto offensive language benchmark dataset.

resources.title: Pashto English Bilingual Sentiment Corpus
resources.summary: Pashto to English bilingual sentiment corpus useful for low-resource sentiment tasks.
resources.primary_use: Sentiment analysis and bilingual NLP experiments
resources.evidence_text: Kaggle dataset title and description identify the corpus as Pashto-English sentiment data.

resources.title: Urdu-Pashto Lexicon Dataset
resources.summary: Lexicon of Urdu words with Pashto translations for dictionary and MT support.
resources.evidence_text: Kaggle metadata describes 7,601 Urdu entries with Pashto translations.

resources.title: Pashto ASR V3 Space
resources.summary: Interactive Hugging Face Space for Pashto automatic speech recognition demos.

resources.evidence_text: Space card title is Pashto ASR V3 and short description states Pashto ASR.

resources.title: Pashto to English Dictionary Space
resources.summary: Streamlit project for Pashto to English dictionary lookups.
resources.evidence_text: Space metadata title states Pashto to English Dictionary.

resources.title: Pashto Translator Space
resources.summary: Streamlit translator project for Pashto to English and Urdu conversion.
resources.evidence_text: Space title is Pashto Translator and description states Pashto to English and Urdu translation.

resources.title: nlpashto Toolkit
resources.summary: Pashto NLP toolkit codebase for tokenization, embeddings, and downstream NLP workflows.
resources.primary_use: Pashto NLP code integration and experimentation
resources.evidence_text: Repository name and description explicitly identify a Pashto NLP toolkit.

resources.summary: Synthetic OCR dataset focused on Pashto ligatures and text recognition tasks.

resources.evidence_text: Kaggle dataset title and subtitle explicitly identify a Pashto OCR dataset.

resources.summary: Pashto BERT model checkpoint for low-resource Pashto NLP experiments.

resources.title: Pashto ASR Space
resources.summary: Interactive Hugging Face Space for Pashto ASR inference demos.

resources.title: worldly-ocr
resources.summary: Open OCR code project that explicitly includes Pashto among target languages.

resources.title: PsOCR: Benchmarking Large Multimodal Models for Optical Character Recognition in Low-resource Pashto Language
resources.summary: Research paper benchmarking multimodal OCR models on low-resource Pashto OCR tasks.

resources.title: English to Pashto Sentences Dataset

resources.title: alpaca-pashto-cleaned
resources.summary: Instruction-style Pashto text dataset suitable for LLM tuning and instruction-following research.

resources.evidence_text: Dataset metadata includes language:ps and dataset name includes Pashto.

resources.title: Whisper Base Pashto
resources.summary: Fine-tuned Whisper Base checkpoint for Pashto ASR with FLEURS ps_af evaluation metadata.

resources.title: ZamAI-Mistral-7B-Pashto Space
resources.summary: Gradio project space demonstrating a Pashto-adapted Mistral 7B interface.
